resources.string: How do you want to sign up?
Sorry! That email is already taken.
If it is yours you can just sign in (Link to sign in activity).
I don\'t think that email exists. Check it again!
Tell us your password! Don\'t worry, we will keep it a secret (wink smiley)
Make sure it is at least 8 characters long.
You can mix up the letters with numbers and characters too. It makes passwords hard to crack.
That password is too short. Make it a bit longer. You need (number of characters more need) more characters
